data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Tanganyika, Democratic Republic of the Congo. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tanganyika, Democratic Republic of the Congo

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Tanganyika, Democratic Republic of the Congo.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Tanganyika to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Tanganyika, Democratic Republic of the Congo a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Tanganyika, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Tanganyika, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.focus_label: Tanganyika, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Tanganyika, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 279,200.

We estimate Tanganyika has 53,669 people who might know Jesus, 202,210 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 23,321 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Tanganyika, Democratic Republic of the Congo, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

location.name: Tanganyika
location.full_name: Tanganyika, Democratic Republic of the Congo
